name: Note Fighter (itch)
description:
Tap the screen, make the blocks fall.

This game was made for 23 Mini Jam, where the theme was time. And limitation was to use only 4 colors.

It was written and drawn by me, and music was made by rafaelgiordanno.

Enjoy!

Scoring:

S - 20pts

A - 10pts

B - 5pts

C - 3pts
